title: The Real Dirty Dancing
overview: The Real Dirty Dancing follows eight celebrities as they fully immerse themselves in the ultimate "Dirty Dancing" experience. Set at Virginia's Mountain Lake Lodge, which was the real location for the film's fictional Kellerman's Lodge, the stars will partner up and learn iconic dance routines from the Jennifer Grey-and Patrick Swayze-led movie and recreate classic scenes - including the legendary lift that cemented the film's spot in cinematic history.
